scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (!/pnpm/.test(process.env.npm_execpath||'') && !/pnpm/.test(process.env.npm_config_user_agent||'')) { console.error('This repository uses PNPM. Please run: pnpm install'); process.exit(1) }"
scripts.ci:format: bash -c 'cd codex-rs && rustup toolchain install nightly --profile minimal >/dev/null && rustup component add rustfmt --toolchain nightly >/dev/null && cargo +nightly fmt -- --config imports_granularity=Item --check'
scripts.ci:clippy: bash -c 'cd codex-rs && CARGO_PROFILE_DEV_DEBUG=0 cargo clippy --all-features --tests --profile dev -- -D warnings'
scripts.ci:test: bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo nextest run --profile ci-test --fail-fast || cargo test --profile ci-test'
scripts.ci:prebuild: bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo check --profile test-cache --quiet && cargo check --tests --profile test-cache --quiet'
scripts.ci:checks: concurrently -n format,spell,mcp,shear "pnpm run ci:format" "pnpm run ci:codespell" "pnpm run ci:mcp-types" "pnpm run ci:shear"
scripts.ci:verify: concurrently -n clippy,test "pnpm run ci:clippy" "pnpm run ci:test:fast"
scripts.ci: pnpm run ci:prebuild && pnpm run ci:checks && pnpm run ci:verify
scripts.test: pnpm run ci:codespell && pnpm run ci:shear && pnpm run ci:format && pnpm run test:codex-rs && pnpm run build
